key.name: email_verify_email_verify_fail
key.value:
Sorry, email address not confirmed.
Most likely:

1) Confirmation link you have used is incorrect. Please copy the correct URL and insert it into the address bar.

2) Confirmation URL expired as it hasn't been used within 5 days. Please send confirmation request again.

key.name: email_verify_promo
key.value:
An email has just been sent for verifying your account
You have to verify your account by clicking on the sent link or entering activation code (available via below of the form)

. You can also use the form below for changing or modifying your email or resending the verification email.
If you have not yet receive any email please contact {$site_email}
By clicking the link in the bottom of this form, you could also verify your account later.

key.name: email_verify_template_html
key.value:
Dear user ({$username}),

To activate your account in {$site_name}! Now you need to verify your email by clicking here

Alternatively you can insert this code at the verification page: {$code}

Thank you,
{$site_name} administration

key.value: Type the email address you used at registration.

key.name: forgot_password_instructions
key.value: To reset password you just need to enter your email address, get our reset code and use it to change your old password.

key.name: forgot_password_mail_template_content_html
key.value:
Dear {$username},

You requested to reset your password. Here\'s your new password: {$password}

\r\nFeel free to log in to your account at {$site_url} and change your password again if necessary.

Thank you,
{$site_name}

key.name: reset_password_mail_template_content_html
key.value:
Dear user ({$username}),
You requested to reset your password. Follow this link {$resetUrl} to change your password.
If the link doesn\'t work, please enter the code manually here {$requestUrl}. Code: {$code}
If you didn\'t request password reset, please ignore this email.

Thank you,{$site_name}

key.name: reset_password_mail_template_content_txt
reset_password_not_equal_error_message
key.value: Values in 'password' and 'repeat password' fields should be equal

key.name: reset_password_request_form_text
key.value: Type in the reset code sent to you. Then you can enter a new password.

key.name: seo_meta_form_element_desc_desc
key.value: Recommended description length is up to 150 symbols

key.name: seo_meta_form_element_title_desc
key.value: Recommended title length is up to 70 symbols

key.name: seo_meta_user_list_label
key.value: All Site Members by List (Online / Latest) Page

key.name: seo_social_index_description
key.value: This page is to help you modify SEO resources in different sections of portal. To access these sections use the menu below.

key.name: seo_social_map
key.value: a file named as sitemap.xml is created automatically in order to help search engines

key.name: seo_social_meta_text
key.value:
You do not need to set up anything - itâs all done for you already. Almost all of the necessary data will be copied from SEO Page Settings and transferred to Open Graph Tags. The following is the list of used tags:

  • og:title - copied from Title
  • og:url - copied from URL
  • og:type - âwebsiteâ value is set by default
  • og:description - copied from Meta Description
  • og:site_name - {$site_name}
  • twitter:title - copied from Title
  • twitter:description - copied from Meta Description
  • og:image and twitter:image - the same image is set for both tags. The following image types will be set automatically depending on page in question: Logo, Video Preview, Event Image, User Photo, Group Image or Logo, Photo Album First Photo, Photo.

key.name: set_suspend_message_label
key.value: Please provide a reason for suspending the member.

key.name: sing_in_to_flag
key.value: You need to sign in to flag content

key.name: site_email_verify_template_html
key.value:
Hello,

Someone (probably you) set this email address as the official email address of {$site_name} website.

To complete this process you need to verify this email address by opening the following URL: {$url}

Alternatively you can open this URL and paste there the following code: {$code}

If you didn't try to do that safely ignore this message and your email will not be used.

Thank you,
Administration
{$site_name}
{$site_url}

key.name: site_email_verify_template_text

key.name: welcome_letter_template_html
key.value:
Welcome to {$site_name}! Thanks for joining us. Here are some quick links that you need to find your way around:

- Main page
- Change avatar
- Upload Photos
- Change profile details
- Look who's in

Feel free to participate in our community!

{$site_name} administration

key.name: welcome_letter_template_text
key.value:
Welcome to {$site_name}! Thanks for joining us. Here are some quick links that you need to find your way around:

- Main page: {$site_url}
- Change profile picture: {$site_url}my-profile
- Upload photos: {$site_url}photo/viewlist/latest
- Change profile details: {$site_url}profile/edit
- Look who's in: {$site_url}users

Feel free to participate in our community!

{$site_name} administration

{$site_url}

key.name: welcome_widget_content
key.value:
Welcome to our site! Here are a few quick links that you need to start your way around:

  • Change profile picture
  • Upload photos
  • Change profile details
  • Preview/rearrange my profile
  • Look who's in

Feel free to participate in our community!

key.value: photo_upload - Photo upload link nchange_avatar - Change profile picture link

key.name: widgets_admin_legend
key.value: Red items are "frozen". Frozen items' positions are fixed and can not be moved or edited by user. They always occupy the upper positions in containers.
